resp = client.indices.create(
    index="museums",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "location": {
                "type": "geo_point"
            },
            "name": {
                "type": "keyword"
            },
            "price": {
                "type": "long"
            },
            "included": {
                "type": "boolean"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
